title: OS API looking up wrong instance ID for 'show'

comments.content: Could this possibly be due to pointing to the wrong db? A rouge sqlite db by chance? edleafe saw this the other day I belive.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pvo

comments.content: I believe this is from a recent change in how instance ID are generated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0

comments.content: Lots of changes have happened in that area since you reported this bug. Any chance you could check this is still an issue with current trunk ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
